menu.description: Crafted with care, straight from our farm to your table. At SammsFarm, we take pride in serving beverages made with the freshest ingredients, sourced directly from our plantations in Bali. Our coffee is brewed using the traditional hot sand method, ensuring a rich and unique flavor. Herbal teas and mixed blends are handpicked from our farm, while our juices are always made fresh to preserve their natural goodness.

items.name: Black Coffee
items.description: Rich and bold, brewed with coffee beans from our Bali plantation using the hot sand method.

items.name: Red Wine Coffee
items.description: A unique infusion of wine aroma with smooth black coffee.

items.name: Specialty Coffee
items.description: Curated single-origin coffee, expertly brewed.

items.name: Luwak Coffee
items.description: Exquisite and rare civet coffee for a luxurious experience.

menu.description: Fresh. Local. Delicious. At SammsFarm, we craft every dish with the freshest ingredients sourced directly from our farms.
